communicabledesc: Our staff speaks English, Russian, and Kazakh languages.
parkingdesc: Our hotel has public parking area free of charge.
marketdesc: There's also free tea and coffee served.
smokingdesc: There's a designated smoking area indoors.
tvdesc: Cable channels are included on the flatscreens.
wifidesc: Our WiFi reaches all areas of hotel.
breakfastdesc: Luxurious breakfasts are served into the rooms.
